plot: The Mass Ornament uses the optical distortion of a mirror lens to reveal images never before seen. A musical with sub mass appeal, this film marries the spectacle of Busby Berkeley with the people's choreography of the everyday.
title: The Mass Ornament
plot_es: The Mass Ornament uses the optical distortion of a mirror lens to reveal images never before seen. A musical with sub mass appeal, this film marries the spectacle of Busby Berkeley with the people's choreography of the everyday.
